page.title: 02INDUSTRIES.
page.content: The Eltex works produce,Pigeon Aviary Bird and Rabbit equipment, Poultry and Gamebird equipment,Farm equipment, Chemical toilets and homewares. Dowty Meco one of the largest industries produce mining equipment. Frank Bryan Sports Ltd,previously made gloves,it closed in 1981.The buildings are now offices only,with the main factory in Yorkshire.They make boxing equipment,cricket pads & gloves. The Cinderella shoe factory ceased production in the early 1970s.The buildings were taken over by Kay & Co Ltd as a returns depot. The Worcester City Tiling Centre is one of the most recently established industries.They operate as roofing contractors and suppliers.They do not produce the tiles,but buy from Redland and Stourport.The company opened in March 1985.
